hooks.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$filepath" == *.ts ]]; then npx tsc --noEmit "$filepath" 2>&1 | head -20 || true; fi

filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if [[ "$filepath" == *tasks.yaml ]]; then check-jsonschema --schemafile "${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT}/skills/PRD/schemas/tasks.schema.json" "$filepath" 2>&1 || echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "tasks.yaml failed schema validation"}'; fi
